"F-got" is an automatic two weeker, no matter the context. Riot developed basically a zero tol towards homophobic/racist slurs and will automatically jump to two weeks even without prior restrictions.

The issue here is that slang. Being Aussie.. Everyone and anyone you know is a c@nt. In fact I just got off the phone with my mate and I said to him " How ya going C "
I understand you can use it in a negative light and so on. But when you just add a overall  idea of standards you cannot be racist to the slang of that country.

While yes %%%got is a homophobic word. Yes I agree that it is auto ban for that. Just like saying KYS. But once you start going into the slang and say " We don't stand for that in USA / Russia / Beer { Yes there is a place called Beer } doesn't mean that in Australia it means the same thing.

To help people understand.. In Aus if you call a black person an [ABBO](https://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=abbo).. That is callified as racist. 
But if you call someone a [gringo](https://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=gringo).. They will just look at you as your a flaming [Drongo](https://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=Drongo). So being auto ban for something that is slang.. Really needs to be fix.

I agree about the C word. it just doesnt carry the same weight in oz as it does in murrica.

I won't say a ban wasn't warranted, because it does seem quite toxic, but if it's your first ban or restriction, then... Eh, I don't know. It seems kind of deserved, imo, but just a little on the harsh side. 

Don't use other people as an excuse for your own poor behaviour/words. It gets you nowhere.

I agree I should have been punished but I feel like I shouldn't have instantly got to weeks after 6 years of good behaviour, a chat restriction should be enough to stop me from letting my self get that toxic. I'm not blaming anyone, it's just so frustrating when you get troll after troll in your games and eventually all the frustration just has to come out.
Bans are being dished out with great enthusiasm for formerly minor infractions atm.
